name: International Seaways, Inc.
description: International Seaways, Inc. is a leading provider of international maritime transportation services, primarily focusing on the transportation of crude oil and petroleum products. Established in 2016, the company has quickly positioned itself as a key player in the shipping industry, operating a versatile fleet of vessels that includes very large crude carriers (VLCCs), Suezmax tankers, and medium-range (MR) tankers. Headquartered in New York City, International Seaways is committed to delivering efficient and reliable shipping solutions to its global customers. The company's fleet is strategically deployed across major shipping routes, enabling it to serve a diverse clientele, including oil majors, refiners, and traders. With a strong emphasis on safety, environmental stewardship, and operational excellence, International Seaways continuously invests in modernizing its fleet and enhancing its operational capabilities. The company is also focused on sustainability and works to reduce its carbon footprint through initiatives such as retrofitting vessels with energy-efficient technologies. As a publicly traded company, International Seaways is committed to transparency and strives to provide value to its shareholders while navigating the complexities of the global shipping market.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: International Seaways, Inc. | Leading Maritime Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: Explore International Seaways, Inc., a leader in maritime transportation specializing in crude oil and petroleum product shipping. Discover our commitment to safety and sustainability.

faq.answer: International Seaways provides maritime transportation services for crude oil and petroleum products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of International Seaways?
faq.answer: Cynthia Williams is the CEO of International Seaways, Inc.

faq.question: Where is International Seaways headquartered?
faq.answer: International Seaways is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of vessels does International Seaways operate?
faq.answer: International Seaways operates a fleet that includes VLCCs, Suezmax tankers, and MR tankers.
